subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Massachusetts Institute of Technology — which sponsored 41 varsity sports this year, tying Harvard for most in the country — announced that it was eliminating eight teams because of the economy: men’s and women’s hockey, men’s and women’s gymnastics, skiing, golf, pistol shooting and wrestling. The pistol team won the Division III national championships in 2005 and 2007.
